name: QuadRite
tag_list: plm, qms, document-control, design-control, program-management, product-lifecycle-management, bom, eco, training, medical-device, quality, operational-excellence
overview:
Software solution provider focused on enabling product companies to commercialize their products profitably while being efficient in use of their capital and resources.

Founded by people who actually have direct experience in running product operations at various companies.

Branded as a new breed of software companies that merge best-practice based business use cases and software technology to provide an enterprise Product Lifecycle Management (PLM) software combined with Quality Management capabilities (QMS) and Operational Excellence elements; all with the goal in mind of enabling companies to streamline their engineering information management, engage in collaborative product development, and improve the speed, efficiency, and effectiveness of their product operations processes.

Whether the business value chain is geographically distributed around the globe or located at a single site, the solution ensures that all product information is easily and securely accessible over the web and using any device.

The solution is an enterprise class out-of-the-box software that leverages modern technology and combined with best-practice processes. It’s Scalable, secure and Internet-based; designed for quick deployment and low total cost of ownership.
